name: obsidian-audiobookshelf-sync
description: Sync your Audiobookshelf library with your notes.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && pnpm run copy-manifest
scripts.release: pnpm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../audiobookshelf-sync-plugin.zip .
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && pnpm run build && git add manifest.json versions.json dist/

author: Christian Kopac <hello@christiankopac.com>
